WHETHER I OUGHT TO BE PRESERVED,
OR WHETHER IT WOULD BE CHARITY OF ME TO STUMBLE.
STILL, I AM NOT WEARY OF LIFE.
YOU TAKE AWAY HOPE AND WHAT REMAINS?,
WHAT PLEASURES? DO YOU FOLLOW ME, THOMAS?
I HAVE SEEN A QUEEN OF FRANCE,
WITH 18 MILLION LIVRES OF DIAMONDS ON HER PERSON.
THAT ALL THE CHARMS OF HER FACE AND FIGURE,
ADDED TO ALL THE GLITTER OF HER JEWELS,
DID NOT IMPRESS ME AS MUCH,
BUT NOW I FIND IF I LOOK AT EVEN THE SMALLEST THING...
MY IMAGINATION BEGINS TO ROAM THE MILKY WAY.
WELL, IT'S A PHRASE FROM SAINT PAUL, YOU FOOL. ,
OH, I WISH THAT HAD ALWAYS BEEN IN MY HEART AND ON MY TONGUE.
TO FALL ON MY KNEES IN ADORATION RIGHT HERE.
OH, IF ONLY MY KNEES WOULD BEND LIKE THEY USED TO.
COME, IT'S TIME FOR BED, FATHER. ,
WHAT? LET'S GET YOU TO BED.
I NEED TO WRITE A LETTER,
IT WAS 50 YEARS AGO THAT OUR NATION WAS BORN.
I MUST WRITE A LETTER TO JEFFERSON.
( panting, grunting ) YOU CAN DO IT TOMORROW.
FATHER, IT'S ONLY THUNDER. IT'S JUST THUNDER.
WHETHER I STAND HIGH OR LOW,
IN THE ESTIMATION OF THE WORLD,
I THANK GOD I HAVE YOU,
FOR A PARTNER IN ALL THE JOYS AND SORROWS,
ALL THE PROSPERITY AND ADVERSITY OF MY LIFE...
TO TAKE A PART WITH ME IN THE STRUGGLE.
Abigail's voice: SHOULD I DRAW YOU THE PICTURE OF MY HEART,
YOU WOULD KNOW WITH WHAT UNDESCRIBABLE PLEASURE,
I HAVE SEEN SO MANY SCORES OF YEARS,
WITH AN AFFECTION HEIGHTENED AND IMPROVED BY TIME.
NOR HAVE THE DREARY YEARS OF ABSENCE,
IN THE SMALLEST DEGREE EFFACED FROM MY MIND,
THE IMAGE OF THE DEAR, UNTITLED MAN TO WHOM I GAVE MY HEART.
NOR DID I WISH TO SEE YOU,
YOU WILL NEVER KNOW HOW MUCH IT COST US,
I HOPE THAT YOU WILL MAKE A GOOD USE OF IT.
THAT I EVER TOOK HALF THE PAINS...
